Direct message the job poster from TEACH Public Schools
Matthew Brown
COO/CFO at TEACH Public Schools
About TEACH Public Schools:We're on a mission to empower visionary leaders who dream of establishinggroundbreaking charter schools in communities that deeply need school choice. Our focus regions are North Carolina, South Carolina, Nevada, New Mexico, and Arizona.🦅 Are You the Leader We're Seeking?- You have an entrepreneurial spirit that pushes boundaries.- Your work ethic never wavers.- You're driven by a desire to bring world-class education programs to yourcommunity.⏳ Fellowship Duration & Commitment:- Varies by jurisdiction's charter school approval process.- Typically requires 10-15 hours/week until charter petition approval.- Begins with a supportive stipend.- Transitions into a full-time paid role as your charter school's vision becomes reality.🤝 How TEACH Supports You:- Leadership skill development.- Guidance in crafting and submitting charter applications.- Strategic planning to establish effective policies and systems.- Expertise in areas like compliance, education law (both local & federal), facility identification, and recruitment strategies.- Committed, shoulder-to-shoulder support from idea inception to schoolinauguration.💡 Your Vision:If you're ignited by the opportunity to drive change, equity, and access through innovative school leadership, let's make your vision a reality.How to Apply:Discover more about this transformative fellowship and submit your application at https://lnkd.in/gYrWgiYg- Applications are reviewed continuously, so don't wait!Join us and shape the future of education!
